```{r castle}
library(bacon)

df_bacon <- bacon(l_homicide ~ post,
                  data = bacon::castle,
                  id_var = "state",
                  time_var = "year")

plot(df_bacon$weight, df_bacon$estimate, pch = df_bacon$type, 
     xlab = "Weight", ylab = "Estimate")
```
